rlVizLib.visualization
Class SelfUpdatingRenderObject

java.lang.Object
  rlVizLib.visualization.RenderObject
      rlVizLib.visualization.SelfUpdatingRenderObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, VizComponentChangeListener
public class SelfUpdatingRenderObject
extends RenderObject
implements VizComponentChangeListener

This used to be the workhorse of redrawing images, now that functionality has moved up to RenderObject. This class now gets to focus on sleeping and polling :)

Author:
btanner
